Tucson had to think devious if he wanted to get anywhere with the queen of =
the insectile colony. Perhaps a white lie would win him the chance to rescu=
e Rodimus and get everyone out safely.  He thought it over and decides agai=
nst that.  

" Please, listen to Talon, your Majesty. We are only here to r=
escue our comrade and after that you won't be bothered with us again, it's =
my promise to you as an Autobot.  You will be free to do as you wish withou=
t violent confrontation.  If you do not comply, you will leave me no choice=
 but to force an attack on your kind, which is the last thing I want to do.=
  So, it's either you let Rodimus go, or you face a war against us and lose=
 many more lives needlessly. "

Straight Shot nodds.

"Yeah, C'mon, we're a=
ll sick of fighting and maybe just maybe you'll get something in return for=
 being a good sport."

They wait for the queen's reply.
